medical_history.chief_complaint: Ecchymosis of both lower limbs without obvious explanation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began in 2020 with ecchymosis of both lower limbs. The patient experienced persistent splenomegaly and increasing thrombocytopenia despite corticosteroid treatment. Symptoms progressed until February 2021 when the patient reported to the hospital. The patient's platelet levels recovered approximately 3 weeks after splenectomy.
